00054         static double linearToMel(const double lFrequency)
00055         {
00056             return 1127.01048 * std::log(1 + lFrequency / 700.0);
00057         }
00058 
00065         static double melToLinear(const double mFrequency)
00066         {
00067             return 700.0 * (std::exp(mFrequency / 1127.01048) - 1);
00068         }
